title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre naturally inclined toward communication thats loving and affirming. You might be happily surprised at how much others seem to be on the same wavelength today. Youre open to receiving and giving affectionate messages to close friends, a partner, or other people you hold dear. Chatty Mercurys conjunction with sweet Venus in your 7th House of Relationships inspires harmonious exchanges and pleasant discussions. Youre even able to take the edge off talks that otherwise might be difficult. Philosopher Mortimer Adler wrote, Love without conversation is impossible. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
